Summary: moving disk like object in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend called me to tell me to go outside and look in the sky at the object that appears to be a disk like object. i went outside and i seen a red blinking light and one white light as it slowly moved east two more lights turned on and off again then several lights lit up as they blinked in sequence from left to right very fast as it began to move north the light continued to move in a circular motion for about 30 seconds then back to the one blinking red light and the single white light i watched it for about 2 minutes and then i lost sight of the object
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around May 4th 2013
